name: Bricks Breaker Shooting
description:
[How to play]
- Position and aim the ball towards the bricks and obstacles with your fingers!
- Fire the balls by letting go!
- Do damage to bricks!
- Clear bricks and obstacles when its durability drops to 0.
- Make sure that the bricks break before they touch the bottom or its game over!

[Features]
- Free to play
- Addictive Gameplay
- Well designed graphics
- Tons of stages/levels
- Easy to play and understand!
- Offline mode! No wifi or data for gameplay!
- Tablet devices supported
- Achievements and Leaderboards available!


This game supports '한국어', 'Indonesian', 'Bahasa malay', 'English', '日本語', '中文简体', '中文繁體', 'Deutsch', 'français', 'Español', 'ไทย', 'Русский', 'Arabic', 'Portuguese', 'Turkish', 'Italian'.

This game is acceptable for purchasing the items partially. When purchasing the items, the additional costs could be occurred and limited Consumer Right of Defense according to the item types.

Official Site: http://superbox.kr
